description: Try our easy to follow Spaghettini With Golden Breadcrumbs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spaghettini With Golden Breadcrumbs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup breadcrumbs, made from stale bread
4 clove garlic, cut into fine slithers

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil and cook spaghettini for 8 minutes until al dente. Drain in a colander, reserving a cup of the cooking water and set aside.
In a frying pan, warm olive oil to medium-hot, but not smoking. Add breadcrumbs, chilli and a sprinkle of salt and saut√© for about 5 minutes, or until breadcrumbs are golden.
Add the garlic and cook for another minute. Toss in parsley and remove from the heat, then stir through lemon zest.
Season with salt and pepper, then remove from the pan and place in a bowl.
Return frying pan to the stove and add the cooked spaghettini and a little more olive oil and the reserved cooking water. Toss well and heat through for a further 30 seconds.
Stir through the lemon juice, place in a serving dish and top with the breadcrumb mixture and freshly grated parmesan.
